sub_title: Litho system performance engineer (EUV Optics Lifetime) at ASML
summary: Expert in plasma-matter interactions and thin film materials processing (plasma ALD, ALE, area-selective ALD). Enjoys working in multidisciplinary team environments. Seeks to merge the skills and experience acquired through work and applied research for overcoming challenges that demand innovation.

profile_positions.title: Lithography system performance engineer - EUV Optics Lifetime
Design Engineer - EUV Optics Lifetime, Plasma Material Interactions

profile_positions.description: Conducted research on controlling ion flux-energy distributions to enable selective atomic layer etching (ALE) for next-generation semiconductor device fabrication
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Managed and co-supervised renewable energy research projects of the Control and Applications Research Centre (CARC) under the EEE department. 

Established CARC as a government authorised and IDCOL (Infrastructure Development Company Ltd.) approved testing center for Solar Home System (SHS) components.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Served as liaison between Greenergy Solutions Ltd., Bangladesh and Innotech Solar AS, Norway. 
Contributed to a Clean Development Mechanism (CDM) project between Greenergy Solutions Ltd. and DS. Power Co. Ltd, Korea, to facilitate the conduction of a feasibility study for the implementation of a solar irrigation system
profile_positions.title: Technology Consultant (R&D)
